title: SPARRA
text:
This Quarto book is a demo of the SPARRA package.
First, we load the package from the local directory.
library(knitr)
library(magrittr)
install.packages("../minisparra/", repos = NULL, type="source")

Installing package into '/home/runner/work/_temp/Library'
(as 'lib' is unspecified)

library(miniSPARRA01)

title: SPARRA

title: SPARRA
text:
AE2 features

  clean_ae2(patient_id_col = "unique_study_id") %>%
  count_ae2_attendance_features() %>%
